adapter_name.title: Name
adapter_name.description: Provide a unique name for this adapter instance. Example: vectorai-group-1

json_credentials.title: Credentials
json_credentials.description: You can download credentials from Google Clouds's iam-admin/serviceaccounts/Keys. Click on Add keys.

model.title: Model
model.description: Provide the name of the model you defined for vectorai

project.title: Project
project.description: Provide the name of the deployment or project you defined for vectorai

max_retries.title: Max Retries
max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries to attempt when a request fails.

max_tokens.title: Max output tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of output tokens to generate. This is limited by the maximum supported by the model and will vary from model to model.
